about_the_game:
Experience the North Rhine-Westphalian regional capital with two Urbino IV versions on routes for five accessible bus lines – amongst others the metrobus line M3. Pass skyscrapers and drive through the daily rush hour in the midst of the city. Over 500 buildings and objects especially developed for Düsseldorf make the city a detailed extension for OMSI 2.

The addon is constantly being updated by chrono events. On top of that, due to random events, there is always variety on the map even during longer play times. Besides, a replacement bus service that wonderfully connects the map with Wuppertal is available as well.

Experience the North Rhine-Westphalian regional capital with two Urbino IV versions on routes for five accessible bus lines – amongst others the metrobus line M3. Pass skyscrapers and drive through the daily rush hour in the midst of the city. Over 500 buildings and objects especially developed for Düsseldorf make the city a detailed extension for OMSI 2.

The addon is constantly being updated by chrono events. On top of that, due to random events, there is always variety on the map even during longer play times.

Besides, a replacement bus service that wonderfully connects the map with Wuppertal is available as well.


  • Urbino IV as Metrobus and city bus version
  • City bus lines 835, 836
  • Metrobus line M3
  • Night bus line NE7
  • Special line SEV (replacement bus service)
  • Over 500 objects especially developed for Düsseldorf
  • Chrono events with current incidents
  • Freeway parts during some routes
  • Original paintwork of the Rheinbahn

name: OMSI 2 Add-On Düsseldorf

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: CPU with 2,8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: at least 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OMSI 2 – Der Omnibussimulator at least 2.3.001

short_description: Experience the North Rhine-Westphalian regional capital with two Urbino IV versions on routes for five accessible bus lines – amongst others the metrobus line M3. Pass skyscrapers and drive through the daily rush hour in the midst of the city.
